text: in this demo we show how Amazon Nova
models can power computer agents which
plan and execute multi-step actions
using the browser and screen-based user
interfaces as universal tools to
automate tasks for end customers let's
see an example of a sales representative
interacting with a Nova powered computer
agent to use sap S4 Hana sap is one of
the most widely used SAS Erp systems
let's say the sales representative needs
to change the shipping address for a
particular order for a customer called
fit Cycles they can ask the agent to do
so in natural language asking to update
shipping order 5116 with the new
information from here on out I will not
touch the system I'm not touching the
mouse or keyboard combining Nova's
visual instruction following and agentic
capabilities delivers industry-leading
performance on key computer agent
benchmarks such as mind to web Visual
Web bench and ground UI this Powers the
agent's ability to navigate for Hana as
you can see now through simple
instructions provided to Nova models
developers can build these abilities to
take actions on websites in browsers and
screen-based tools we can see here some
of the agents actions and intermediary
thoughts as it thinks step by step to
take the next optimal step to achieve
its goal of changing the delivery
address right now it is scrolling to
find order number 5116 by navigating the
UI we see the agent autonomously
actuating the browser on the customer's
behalf the agent understands the S4 Hana
UI and interacts with the varied
elements such as entering in the
customer information it filled out a
form it even can click links and
dropdowns the agent had searched for the
appropriate order including the company
name and Order ID and now we will update
the form fields to set a new delivery
address the house number is just updated
as well as the
district and now the postal
code the
city and the
region and there you have it the agent
has successfully updated the order
information and that is the power of
Nova computer agents thank you
